Articles.Content: tell me your guess ill tell you if you got it right

A piece of ????

THIS POST HAS FLAGGED AS INAPPROPRIATE BY SOPA, AND WILL BE DELETED

\'Backwords\'? Surely you mean \'Backwards\'?

If so, \'SOPA\' backwards is \'APOS\'.

Meaning nothing as a word, but it does form an acronym.
I think he wants the answer Soap.

????. I mean, \'an ass\'. Pronounced as ZhOPA.

Also: Senator\'s Obviously a Perverted Asshole.

What more?

* APOS American Psychosocial Oncology Society

* APOS After Point of Sales

* APOS All Phases of Step Cycle (pain treatment system)

* APOS Acoustic Processor Operating Station

* APOS Asia-Pacific Optical Fiber Sensors (conference)

* APOS Austrian Positioning System

* APOS Advanced Process Oriented Steering

Come on guys, it means A Peice Of Shit

BTW, nasa123, we know who you are!

\'Backwords\'? Surely you mean \'Backwards\'?

I believe he\'s referring to the so-called backronym.

BTW, nasa123, we know who you are!

And who would that be? Seriously, I am curious.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

And who would that be? Seriously, I am curious.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Well, it\'s a funny story.

The website he linked to had 2 main users, We (the super secret spy team) found a minecraft server that he had recently played on,

thinking that he was some 20-year-old guy named Jaarad. But, when I got on the server, they were discussing that a little kid named Caleb was on the server griefing yesterday. Caleb was the other user on the site (it was his username also) so we knew it was him.

Basically, we found out his name was Caleb and he was infact 11.

He already said he was 11.

EDIT: Although the site is pretty funny; he tried to shut it down, like he said he would, but just wrote \'SITE SHUT DOWN UNTIL SOPA/PIPA IS GONE\' on the front page; everything else is still there.

DOUBLE EDIT: Although props to him for actually writing a simple sentence with correct spelling and grammar.

A piece of ????

YOUR RIGHT!!!!!!

Come on guys, it means A Peice Of Shit

BTW, nasa123, we know who you are!

Who????
[me=iamwearingpants]whistles and walks away staring at Caleb[/me]

I believe he\'s referring to the so-called backronym.

Ah, I see. I thought it was a spelling mistake.

P.S. SOPA is dead:http://mashable.com/2012/01/20/sopa-is-dead-smith-pulls-bill/
